item.title: @elonmusk: I just tried Tesla FSD for the first time and WOW it completely blew me away. Cybertruck drove me fu...
item.description: I just tried Tesla FSD for the first time and WOW it completely blew me away. Cybertruck drove me fully autonomously from south austin to dallas (>200 miles!), without me having to touch the steering wheel, gas, or brakes even once. I‚Äôve never been more impressed by a new technology. It handled city and highway, construction zones, on/off ramps, stop lights, red lights, and lane changes at human or better levels. Every legacy auto maker is dead in the water. You simply cannot compete with this.

item.title: @elonmusk: We are those who do not kneel. We challenge. We conquer. We are Prometheus. We are the nation that p...
item.description: We are those who do not kneel. We challenge. We conquer. We are Prometheus. We are the nation that produces one thousand Icaruses until one survives. We will plant our flag on every piece of rock in the universe that can hold one because we dare to try.

item.title: @elonmusk: grok imagine: close-up view from behind of a fierce fantasy warrior woman in a snowy environment, lo...
item.description: grok imagine: close-up view from behind of a fierce fantasy warrior woman in a snowy environment, long platinum blonde hair styled in an elaborate Viking-inspired braid with metallic bronze rings and beads threaded through the strands, intricate black tribal tattoos covering her upper back and shoulders resembling swirling patterns and runes, holding a large ancient sword over her shoulder with the ornate pommel and hilt dusted in snow, gently falling snowflakes in the air, cold atmospheric lighting, cinematic fantasy style, highly detailed, realistic textures, moody winter vibe.
